name: bloxy
description: A Node.JS library for interacting with the Roblox website and its API.

scripts.postinstall:
echo "
Thank you for installing bloxy! 

NOTE: THIS VERSION IS A DEVELOPMENT. 
PLEASE, USE VERSION 4.0.0-alpha3 FOR THE LATEST ''STABLE'' VERSION OF BLOXY."
scripts.create-docs: typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --hideBreadcrumbs --hideSources --namedAnchors --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --out docs src && mkdocs gh-deploy
scripts.prepare-windows: npm install && npm run build && npm run create-docs && echo 'Finished'

author: ScriptBased
